title: HELLO? SERVER?
body: What the heck is up with the server, it just kinda crashed wtf... anyone else getting this?{{item:3070}}

replies.body: it seems to be a server wide issue
Bro i just started a ranked and now cant login.. gg wtf

It gets annoying when you get it daily {{champion:83}}  Riot needs to fix the servers cus whatever they're doing, they missed something. Wait until that happens in game then they give you bans for it. Fuking rage quit.
